meanings.definition: A point or level beyond which something does not or may not extend or pass.
meanings.sent1: The mountain peak marked the limits of our hike.
meanings.sent2: She reached her limits and had to take a break.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's acrobatics pushed the limits of believability.
meanings.sent4: His patience knew no limits when dealing with difficult customers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher set clear limits for acceptable behavior in the classroom.

meanings.definition: The furthest extent of one's physical or mental endurance.
meanings.sent1: Running a marathon tested her limits.
meanings.sent2: He pushed himself to the limits during the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes stretched the limits of good taste.
meanings.sent4: Her determination knew no limits when pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The storm pushed the limits of the old building, causing it to collapse.

meanings.definition: A restriction or boundary that defines the scope of something.
meanings.sent1: The speed limit on the highway is 65 miles per hour.
meanings.sent2: There are limits to how much you can spend on this project.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity knows no limits, always exploring new places.
meanings.sent4: His love for her had no limits, reaching across oceans.
meanings.sent5: The rules clearly state the limits of acceptable behavior in the workplace.
